Margalla Skills Development Academy

Aim and Scope

Aim of this website is to provide necessary assistance to "Young Aspiring Scholars & Researchers" in the fields of academic writing and publishing alongwith developing and polishing necessary skill sets to use latest research methodologies, intelligent, ethical and smart use of assistive technologies including artificial intelligence and other available software technologies. At present,our team of expert researchers provides personalized guidance and assistance for following subjects:-

  • Academic Writing
  • Web Development
  • Mathematics - Fluid Mechanics
  • Bio-Informatics
  • Bio-Technology
  • Curriculum Development
